thread.section_title: Eliseo Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel
thread.title_full: Nice hotel - Review of Eliseo Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: YaronB61
title: Nice hotel
text:
We were in elisoe hotel for four nights. we found it as a nice and clean hotel and room.
the room was a little small but enough. the breakfast served in the upper floor with a beautiful view to borgheze gardens.the menu is the same evry day. all the staff was polite and ready to help. the check in and out was fast
Room Tip: ask for room in upper floor and garden view See more room tips
